name: Evasive
effect: Spend & roll 1-2 to dodge an attack. When a player with evasive receives damage, they may choose to spend this token. If spent, roll 1. If the outcome is 1-2, no damage is recieved. Multiple evasive tokens may be spent in an attempt to revent the same source of damage

name: Reflex
effect: Spend & roll 1 die to add 1/2 value to Attack damage. If a player concludes their Offense roll with an Attack, they may spend this token. If spent, roll 1 die and add 1/2 the value as damage, rounded up

name: Stagger
effect: Spend 2 CP or skip Offense roll. To remove this token, a player afflicted with it must spend 2 CP before the start of their Offensive roll phase. If the player does not, they must skip their Offensive roll phase and then remove this token

name: Bounty
effect: Receive +1 damage and Attacker gains 1 CP. When a player afflicted with this token is Attacked by an opponent, the attacker increases their dmg by 1 and gains 1 CP. Peristent

name: Poison
effect: Recieve 1 unblockable damage in Upkeep Phase. A player afflicted with this token is dealt 1 damage per Poison token during the Upkeep Phase of their turn. Peristent
